local_only_description: Use Only Local Storage (No Cloud Sync)
add_first_group: Create a Group to Split Expenses
title: Title
choose_different_to: Choose a Different Person for To
include_at_least_one: Include at Least One Person in the Split
receipt_scan_web_unavailable: Receipt scan is not available on web. Use the app on Android or iOS.
bill_breakdown_hint: Optional: add line items (e.g. from a receipt) or tap the camera to scan.
receipt_ocr_enabled_description: When off, only attach the picture without reading text
receipt_ai_enabled_description: Extract vendor, date and total with Gemini or OpenAI
logs_copied_paste: Logs copied. Paste them when reporting an issue.
import_confirm: This may overwrite or duplicate data. Continue?
settlement_method_pairwise_desc: Per-pair net. You pay only people you shared expenses with.
settlement_method_greedy_desc: Fewest transfers overall. You might pay someone you never shared with.
settlement_method_consolidated_desc: One transfer per person you owe, with expense breakdown.
settlement_method_treasurer_desc: Everyone pays or receives through one person.
settlement_frozen_hint: Balances and transfers are locked. Unfreeze when everyone has settled.
settlement_freeze_description: Pause calculation so everyone can settle without changes. New expenses will be blocked.
add_expense_blocked_frozen: Settlement is frozen. Unfreeze in group settings to add expenses.
onboarding_what_is_hisab: Group expense splitting and settle-up app for trips, events, and roommates.
onboarding_groups_desc: Create groups (e.g. Trip to Madinah) with participants.
onboarding_participants_desc: Add friends or family who share expenses.
onboarding_expenses_desc: Log who paid what, with split types: Equal, Parts, or custom Amounts.
onboarding_balance_desc: See who owes whom; view You Owe and Owes You.
onboarding_settle_up_desc: Get suggested minimal transfers to clear balances.
onboarding_offline_desc: Work locally only. No account required.
onboarding_online_desc: Sync with cloud. Sign in required.
onboarding_online_unavailable: Online requires Auth0 and Convex configuration.
return_to_onboarding_confirm: Return to the onboarding flow? You can change language, theme, and connection preferences again.
reset_all_settings_description: Restore all settings to defaults (theme, language, API keys, etc.)
reset_all_settings_confirm: Reset all settings to defaults? This will clear API keys and sign you out.
delete_all_data_description: Permanently remove all groups, participants, and expenses
delete_all_data_confirm: Permanently delete all your data? This cannot be undone.
delete_all_data_done: All data deleted. Returning to onboarding.
